EmailTemplate.name: Insite Pricing and RSGR Functionality
EmailTemplate.subject: Insite Pricing and RSGR Functionality
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for your enquiry regarding INSITE. INSITE is a Microsoft Windows based electronic service diagnostic program that allows you to troubleshoot Cummins electronic engines.
A subscription is required to use INSITE, and the software must be installed into your device. The software can be downloaded from https://www.cummins.com/parts-and-service/digital-products-and-services.
You will require an INLINE Adaptor Kit to link your computer to the engine ECM. Please refer to attachments:
(See attached file: Inline 7.pdf)
INSITE Functionality:
RSGR/Industrial Pro functionality limits the access to Road Speed Governor parameters and Industrial Pro provides calibration downloads to Industrial products only. See table below for list of features. Basic functionality is read only and does not have adjustment or calibration download capability.
See document below for functionality table:
(See attached file: Insite Brochure.pdf)
Subscription Cost:
RSGR/Industrial Pro P/N CSP3886393 $***Enter price*** +GST - This includes Basic functionality
The INSITE subscription is valid for 12 months on a single user name and only one computer at any given time. INSITE can be transferred between work stations at a maximum of 5 times.
If you would like to place an order for any of the aforementioned parts or would like some further information please contact us via return email or call 1300 286 646.
Regards,
Cummins Support Centre - Scoresby
AUSTRALIA T 1300Cummins | E 1300cummins@cummins.com | NEW ZEALAND T 0800Cummins PARTS | MON - FRI 8.00am - 8.30pm AEST | SAT 8.00am - 4.00pm AEST SERVICE | 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: This email and any attachments are for the exclusive and confidential use of the intended recipient and may contain privileged information. If you are not the intended recipient, please do not read, distribute or take action in reliance upon this message. If you have received this in error, please notify us immediately by return email and promptly delete this message and its attachments from your computer system. We do not waive attorney-client or work product privilege by the transmission of this message.
